review: My sister had been to hospital and it was for gynaecology related. ********* *** **** ** *** ******* I am satisfied with the treatment given. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people.  Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time when we went. Medical tests were done in the hospital. Doctor was friendly.

My aunt had consulted the doctor and it was for health concern. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. She is satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Medical tests were done in the hospital. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. She was a nice person. My aunt had to gain weight. September we have plans to visit again. She also had gynaecology issues.

I had been to Apollo Women's hospital to consult for my uterus problem with Dr Vishnu Vandana. She guided me with the right tests & took care of the procedures perfectly. A superb experience on my uterus removal surgery. A wonderful hospitality in Apollo Women's hospital Cradle & a highly  professional doctor.

I had taken consultation for my wife for gynae issue and visited the Hospital. ****** *** **** ***** Doctor has prescribed few medicines and asked us to revisit the clinic after 2 months. We could find the difference in the doctor treatment. Clinic staff was good and responsive.
